name: Gun Shot!
description:
Tap to fire the bullet, hit the target, and avoid all other gun shots! Aim to shoot the spinning circle, precision counts and don’t make any mistakes! The more gun shots you fire, the harder it becomes. Spin the guns, fire the bullets, blow up the target and build your own collection of legendary guns!

Game Features:
- Dozens of weapons with cool design and more to come
- Simple quick reflex tapping gameplay but really hard to master
- Hundreds of levels to solve, intertwined with all sorts of tweaks and surprises
